concept.title: Kitchen safety
concept.shortdesc: Follow safe practises to avoid accident or injury in the kitchen.

messagepanel.howtoavoid: When picking up a knife, make sure you aren't holding anything else or are distracted.
To keep hot items from slipping or spilling, use the right cooking utensils.
The kitchen presents safety concerns surrounding food preparation. Improper food preparation can lead to food poisoning like salmonella. Prepare food safely for yourself and your family.
Always wash your hands well with soap and water before you begin preparing a meal.
